entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
